summary: Frontend testing complete for My Positions bug fix. All features working correctly - positions (MSFT, NVDA) are displayed with correct data from Alpaca API.

my_positions_section.details: My Positions section displays both MSFT and NVDA correctly

positions_clickable.details: Clicking MSFT position opens ticker detail modal with Overview, Chart, Technicals, Fundamentals, Earnings, Strategies, News tabs

market_intel_panel.details: Power Hour Report displays with Market Regime, Market Positioning, In-Play Stocks, EOD Strategy sections

ai_chat_input.details: Chat input is functional and accepts user input

bug_fix_verified.issue: My Positions section not displaying real Alpaca account positions
bug_fix_verified.root_cause: useEffect in useCommandCenterData.js depended on connectionChecked which was false on initial load
bug_fix_verified.fix_applied: Added separate useEffect that fetches positions immediately on mount (lines 455-461), independent of IB connection status
bug_fix_verified.result: Positions now load correctly on page load

context_for_next_testing_agent: My Positions bug has been fixed. The fix was adding a separate useEffect hook in useCommandCenterData.js that fetches positions immediately on mount using fetchAccountData(), independent of IB connection status. The Alpaca API /api/trading-bot/positions correctly returns positions with symbol, qty, side, avg_entry_price, current_price, unrealized_pnl, and unrealized_pnl_pct fields.
